title: U.S. military says it shot down Iranian drone that 'aggressively approached' aircraft carrier
summary_full: U.S. Central Command said the drone approached the USS Abraham Lincoln in the Arabian Sea with "unclear intent."
summary_public: U.S. Central Command said the drone approached the USS Abraham Lincoln in the Arabian Sea with "unclear intent."

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: U.S. military says it shot down Iranian drone that 'aggressively approached'
